title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1407/98 of 1 July 1998 amending for the 12th time Regulation (EC) No 913/97 adopting exceptional support measures for the pigmeat market in Spain
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1407/98 of 1 July 1998 amending for the 12th time Regulation (EC) No 913/97 adopting exceptional support measures for the pigmeat market in Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
However, Article 1(2) shall apply with effect from 12 June 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
